name: list_accounts
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool calltrackingmetrics.
Tool description: Track the performance of your advertising with instantly activated tracking numbers in 30 countries. Integrate with Google and track down to keyword level.
API description: Fetches a list of accounts from the API, optionally paginated by a specified page number.

page.description: The page number for paginated results. Defaults to None.
